details:
Josh Triplett discovered that ikiwiki did not block Javascript in
URLs, leading to cross-site scripting vulnerabilities ([CVE-2008-0808](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2008-0808),
[CVE-2008-0809](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2008-0809)).


The old stable distribution (sarge) did not contain an ikiwiki package.


For the stable distribution (etch), this problem has been fixed in
version 1.33.4.


For the unstable distribution (sid), this problem has been fixed in
version 2.31.1.


We recommend that you upgrade your ikiwiki package.
